changeSet.comment: AHS-11837 Some default machine category names change in machine tree after editing
changeSet.sql: update MACHINECATEGORY set NAME = 'Scales' where NAME = 'Scale' and not exists( select 'x' from MACHINECATEGORY where NAME = 'Scales');
update MACHINECATEGORY set NAME = 'Panel' where NAME = 'Panel Classes' and not exists( select 'x' from MACHINECATEGORY where NAME = 'Panel');
update MACHINECATEGORY set NAME = 'Teleremote Control' where NAME = 'Teleremote Control Classes' and not exists( select 'x' from MACHINECATEGORY where NAME = 'Teleremote Control');
update MACHINECATEGORY set NAME = 'Perception Targets' where NAME = 'Perception Target Categories' and not exists( select 'x' from MACHINECATEGORY where NAME = 'Perception Targets');
update MACHINECATEGORY set NAME = 'Blast Hole Drill' where NAME = 'Blasthole Drill Classes' and not exists( select 'x' from MACHINECATEGORY where NAME = 'Blast Hole Drill');
